metadata.description: Relevance criteria for Angle 6: Human factors, communication gaps, and AI Agent Protocol opportunities in DER Operations.

primary_research_focus.title: Angle 6: Human Factors, Communication Gaps, and AI Agent Protocol Opportunities in DER Operations
primary_research_focus.core_question: How can AI Agent Protocols improve communication, reduce manual labor, and better integrate human operator intent and oversight within DER operations, by addressing existing gaps and inefficiencies?
primary_research_focus.subfocus: Identifying literature on human element in DER operations, communication challenges, manual labor, and opportunities for AI Agent Protocol application.

1_human_operator_roles_tasks.description: Literature describing what human operators currently *do* in DER management, control rooms, maintenance, etc.

operator_activities.description: Focus on the roles and tasks performed by human operators in DER contexts.

2_communication_challenges_manual_proces.description: Papers identifying bottlenecks, inefficiencies, or reliance on manual communication/data handling in DER operations.

comm_manual_issues.description: Focus on issues in communication and manual processes within DER.

3_decision_support_situational_awareness.description: Work related to providing operators with better tools or information for decision support and situational awareness.

operator_support_tools.description: Focus on tools and systems aiding human operators.

4_human_factors_optimization.description: Solutions already attempted to improve the human aspect of DER operations (workflow, software, hardware).

hf_optimization_solutions.description: Focus on optimizations related to human factors in DER.

5_human_in_the_loop_control.description: Systems where humans and automated DER systems collaborate or where humans provide oversight.

human_automation_collaboration.description: Focus on collaborative human-automation systems and oversight.

6_ai_agent_protocol_interfaces.description: Scenarios where standardized agent communication (AI Agent Protocols) could clearly benefit.

agent_protocol_opportunities.description: Focus on potential application points for AI agent protocols.
